name: Space Lagat
description: Remake of a video game for the Agat (soviet 8-bit computer, clone of the Apple II) The goal of the game is to evade the snake and to gain points by collecting crystals. Keep in mind that different crystals worth different amount of points. Every 200 points you move to a next level, every 1k points you get an extra life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space
